text: So sorry I must have missed this before the holiday! Thank you so much <@U25PYL3Q8>. What you said about the page reload is exactly what I thought would have to happen as well as they wouldn't have a record ID yet. I agree that the email would be the best option here as well. <@U04AGAF1CGL> we can talk about this on our other thread in the Flowspace slack channel but let me know what you think!
hey <@U049MGY3MU7> â€” let me know if you need any other guidance! same for you <@U04AGAF1CGL>

Is there a unique form submission ID that's available? The e-mail option is viable but we are expecting drop off since the CTA is async in e-mail versus immediately available.  We are looking for any capturable ID that is generated that we can pass to our app and then later use to connect back to a HubSpot form submission/contact
Hi everyone, Is it possible to use HUBDB as my database in WordPress?
You can use JavaScript and query the HubDB table with the API
